posts.message:
Question to Rails people: I have an app that pulls data from an external api every 5 secs, I use Httparty and Rufus for that. What is the best practice to update the view with the new pulled data?
1- Notify the view from the controller
2- Make the view pull the data periodically (and whether it is possible or not)
The app will be running locally. Any hints on how it can be done are also welcomed.
This guys is a fuckin legend!

posts.message: Wanna share it with you guys

Raspberry Pi Zero is an -almost- full fledged computer for 5$, except that you need to spend anthoer 5$ for connectors turning mini HDMI to normal HDMI, and mini USB to normal USB. And another 5$ to get a USB wifi dongle for connectivity.
posts.description: The newest Raspberry Pi costs just $5, and is available to buy now. It's free with the December issue of The Magpi Magazine, in UK stores today.
